SCHOOL CLOSURE SUPPLEMENTAL LEARNING ACTIVITIES AND RESOURCES

p.a: SCHOOL CLOSURE SUPPLEMENTAL LEARNING ACTIVITIES AND RESOURCES

div.p: High school students can access individual teacher Google Classroom pages to find supplemental learning materials. Students in AP classes should keep up with all assigned classwork. Middle school students have been invited to new grade level "Challenge Pages" on Google Classroom and can find supplemental learning materials there.
For additional resources available to all students, access the SVS library page here.
Follow @svs_principal on Twitter for more supplemental learning ideas.
Please contact Mrs. Gallo at gallok@region-12.org with any questions.

img.alt: Teacher with students in the classroom

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window
